hero.title: Validate your business idea in
hero.description: Get data-driven insights and validation scores for your business idea. Make informed decisions before investing time and resources.

auth.sign_in_description: Please sign in with your account to submit an idea.
auth.sign_in_to_upload: Please sign in to upload an idea.
auth.sign_in_required_alert: You need to sign in to submit your idea. Your idea has been saved as a draft and will be available after you sign in.

ideas.discover_ideas: Discover and vote on validated business ideas

dashboard.title: Browse Ideas
dashboard.subtitle: Discover and vote on validated business ideas
dashboard.search_placeholder: Search ideas by title, description, or tags...
dashboard.no_filters_applied: No filters applied. Click "Add Filter" to create filtering conditions.

activity.title: Activity
activity.no_ideas: You haven't created any ideas yet
activity.no_ideas_description: Start by sharing your first idea to see your activity here

idea_analytics.title: Idea Analytics
idea_analytics.subtitle: Detailed insights about this idea
idea_analytics.score_description: This score reflects the overall market validation of your idea. Higher scores indicate stronger market potential.
idea_analytics.vote_meaning_description: Votes help determine the feasibility and impact of your idea:
idea_analytics.up_vote: I would use this - Indicates market demand
idea_analytics.down_vote: I wouldn't use this - Indicates potential issues
idea_analytics.pay_vote: I would pay for this - Strongest validation signal
idea_analytics.no_comments: No comments yet for this idea
idea_analytics.sentiment_description: This chart shows the overall sentiment of your idea based on user votes. "Use" votes indicate positive interest, "Pay" votes show strong validation, and "Dislike" votes suggest concerns.
idea_analytics.suggestion_1: Consider addressing concerns from users who wouldn't use this product
idea_analytics.suggestion_2: Explore ways to increase perceived value to encourage more "I would pay" votes
idea_analytics.suggestion_3: Encourage more user feedback and discussion to validate your idea further
idea_analytics.suggestion_4: Add relevant tags to help users discover your idea
idea_analytics.all_good: Your idea is performing well! Keep up the great work and continue engaging with your audience.

example.message: Sign in to unlock your personal activity dashboard and analytics. Here's a preview of what you can access:
example.feature_1: Track all your submitted ideas in one place
example.feature_2: View detailed analytics and performance metrics
example.feature_3: Get insights on market validation and user feedback
example.idea_description: A revolutionary software-as-a-service platform that streamlines business operations and increases productivity.
example.idea_description_2: Sustainable and biodegradable packaging solution for the food industry.
example.idea_description_3: A social networking app focused on professional development and mentorship.

cta.title: Ready to Validate Your Idea?
cta.description: Join hundreds of entrepreneurs who have validated their business ideas with our platform.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: A simple three-step process to validate your business idea

submit.title: Submit Idea
submit.description: Fill out a simple form with your business idea details.

analysis.title: AI Analysis
analysis.description: Our system analyzes your idea using market data and validation frameworks.

results.title: Get Results
results.description: Receive a comprehensive validation report within 48 hours.

footer.description: Validate your business idea in 48 hours

messages.generic_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
messages.idea_submitted: Your idea has been submitted successfully!

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.clear_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all notifications?
notifications.idea_created_message: Your idea "{title}" has been created successfully!

comments.title: Comments
comments.no_comments: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
comments.max_mentions_reached: You can mention up to 3 AI Personas per comment
comments.submit_error: Failed to submit comment. Please try again.

validation.please_fill_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields correctly
validation.title_min_length: Title must be at least 10 characters
validation.content_required: Please add at least one content block with content
validation.idea_creation_error: Error creating idea. Please try again.
validation.invalid_media_url: The provided media URL is not accessible (404 or server error). Please use a valid URL.

form.add_tags_hint: Add tags below to categorize your idea
form.type_tag_placeholder: Type a tag and press Enter
form.post_anonymously_description: Hide your name when this idea is shown to the public

features.title: Premium Features
features.invite_members: Invite members by username or email

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage ideas, reports, and platform settings
dashboard.search_placeholder: Search ideas by title, description, or tags...
dashboard.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this idea? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.delete_error: Error deleting idea. Please try again.
dashboard.admin_info_message: You have admin privileges on this page. You can delete ideas and manage content.

settings.title: Settings
settings.theme_description: Choose your preferred color scheme for the application
settings.language_description: Select your preferred language for the interface
settings.auto_save_message: Your settings are automatically saved when you make changes

ai_deep_research.title: Deep Research Results
ai_deep_research.clear_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all research history?
ai_deep_research.advisory_note: This research is for informational purposes. Use it to validate your idea's market potential.
ai_deep_research.interest_over_time: Search interest over the past year

ai_risk_feedback.clear_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all analysis history?
ai_risk_feedback.advisory_note: This feedback is advisory only. You decide what to post.

ai_personas_evaluation.clear_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all evaluation history?
ai_personas_evaluation.advisory_note: This evaluation is advisory only. AI personas provide perspectives to help you improve your idea.

ai.daily_limit_exceeded: AI model has reached daily usage peak. Please try again later.
ai.service_unavailable: AI service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

ai_comments.question: Would you like your idea to receive three AI-generated comments giving you feedback on your idea?
ai_comments.explanation: These comments provide diverse perspectives from AI personas to help validate and improve your idea before it goes public.
ai_comments.no_credits_message: You don't have credits right now. You can wait until tomorrow for your daily credits to reset, or upgrade your plan for more credits.

credits.insufficient_message: You need credits to use this feature. Upgrade your plan to get more credits.
credits.confirmation_message: This will use {cost} credit(s) for {feature}. Do you want to continue?
credits.last_credit_message: This is your last daily credit. After using it, you'll need to wait until tomorrow or upgrade your plan for more credits.

versioning.edit_modal_description: Choose how you want to make changes to your idea
versioning.create_new_description: Create version {number} with fresh votes and comments
versioning.set_active_description: Version {number} will be shown to all users in search, home, and idea listings
versioning.version_activated: Version {number} is now the public version
versioning.no_other_versions: This is the only version of this idea
